pkgmetadata.longdescription: Official Ably Bindings for Python==================================A Python client library for Ably Realtime messaging.Setup-----You can install this package by using the pip tool and installing: pip install ablyUsing Ably for Python---------------------- Sign up for Ably at https://ably.com/sign-up- Get usage examples at https://github.com/ably/ably-python- Visit https://ably.com/docs for a complete API reference and more examples
